articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys New Year's Concert Given by Unhasu Orchestra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys New Year's Concert Given by Unhasu Orchestra
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army, enjoyed 2012 New Year's concert "The Cause of the Sun Will Be Immortal" given by the Unhasu Orchestra on the New Year. 
					Warmly acknowledging the enthusiastic cheers of the audience, he heartily congratulated them on the New Year.
					
					After the playing of the national anthem, the audience paid silent tribute to fatherly leader Kim Jong Il in humblest reverence.
					
					Its repertoire included female trio and chorus "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", female trio and female pangchang immortal masterpiece "Song of Best Wishes", chorus "His Life", male duet and male pangchang "We Long for You, General", male solo and pangchang "When We Sing of Songun", orchestral music and chorus ""On the Path of Struggle under the Leadership of the General" and narration and orchestral music "Korea Has Risen Up".
					
					The performers eulogized the fact that Kim Jong Il represented the burning hearts of the army and people of the DPRK and the destiny and future of Kim Il Sung's nation and he was a symbol of dignity and mightiness and matchless strength of Songun Korea and that all the servicepersons and people have traversed the road of the glorious revolution, holding the great, distinguished, enthusiastic and staunch leader, noble and genuine great man in the present era.
					
					The concert deeply impressed the audience as it powerfully demonstrated that Kim Jong Il will be always with the ranks of the people making a general onward march, confidently advancing towards a new victory of the Juche revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and will always live in the hearts of the service persons and people of the DPRK.
					
					He warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audiences. 
					
					Greatly satisfied with the admirable concert which was clear-cut in ideological and thematic principle and fully reflected the Korean people's ardent desire and wish and their steadfast pledge and will, he gave thanks to the performers, highly appreciating their successful performance.
					
					Noting that the concert was successfully arranged, narrative poem in particular was very good and it was recited well, he said with emotion that whenever the benevolent image of Kim Jong Il was projected, he could not keep back tears in his eyes and was greatly inspired to watch the concert. 
					
					Our servicepersons and people are very high in their indomitable mental power as they have greeted the New Year, renewing their firm pledge to implement the behests of Kim Jong Il to the last, holding him in high esteem forever, he said. 
					
					He expressed great expectation and belief that the whole party and army and all the people would bring about great innovations and big leap forward again in the new year's march and thus glorify 2012 as a year of pledge and implementation to show before the whole world how the soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il l uphold and realize his desire. 
					
					Among the audience were senior officials of the party, state and armed forces organs Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, O Kuk Ryol, Kang Sok Ju, Pyon Yong Rip, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Rak Hui, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk, Kim Chang Sop, officials of the party and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and service members of the KPA.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on Friday received a congratulatory message from Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad.
					The message said:
					
					Extending, on behalf of the Syrian Arab people and on my own, the most heartfelt congratulations to Your Excellency on your becoming the supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, I wish you success in your new job.
					
					I am sure that the close relations of friendship between the Syrian Arab Republic and the DPRK will grow stronger in the interests of the two friendly peoples under your leadership.
					
					Please accept my best regards to you.

articles.title: China and DPRK, States with Traditional Good-neighborly and Friendly Ties: Chinese FM Spokesperson
articles.content:
China and DPRK, States with Traditional Good-neighborly and Friendly Ties: Chinese FM Spokesperson
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Chinese Foreign Ministry expressed belief that the DPRK would continue pushing forward socialist construction.
					Answering a question by VOA over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il on Dec. 29, the spokesperson said:
					
					China and the DPRK are friendly neighbors. After the demise of Kim Jong Il, the supreme leader of the DPRK, the Chinese side expressed deep condolences in various forms.
					
					What I want to emphasize is our belief that the Korean people would continue pushing forward the socialist cause by turning sorrow into strength under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					China and the DPRK are states of traditional good-neighborly and friendly ties.
					
					We will make joint efforts with the DPRK side to steadily consolidate the friendship between the two parties, countries and peoples and defend peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the region.

articles.title: Cambodia-DPRK Friendly Relations Would Grow Stronger: Cambodian King
articles.content:
Cambodia-DPRK Friendly Relations Would Grow Stronger: Cambodian King
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador to Cambodia Hong Ki Chol presented his credentials to Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni on Dec. 30 last year.
					The king expressed most profound condolences over the demise of Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, on behalf of the great king and the great queen of Cambodia and on his own and on behalf of the Cambodian government and people. He said:
					
					The friendly relations between Cambodia and the DPRK are historic and special relations personally provided by Great King Norodom Sihanouk and President Kim Il Sung.
					
					We are grateful and will always remember the great support and encouragement rendered by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to the great king, great queen and the Cambodian people and the benevolence shown for us.
					
					I am convinced that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger under the deep care of HE Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Korean people.
					
					I highly estimate the achievements made by the DPRK in all fields of the state building according to the line of Juche under the outstanding leadership of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The great king, the great queen, I and the Cambodian government and people positively support the DPRK's cause of building a thriving nation and believe that the Korean people would register greater successes.

articles.title: Personages of Peru, U.S., Int'l Organizations and Representatives at UN Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Personages of Peru, U.S., Int'l Organizations and Representatives at UN Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Personages of different countries and representatives at UN paid condolatory visits to the DPRK mission in Peru and the DPRK permanent mission at UN on Dec. 27 and 28 last year on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Among them were personages of the Peruvian Communist Party, the People's Women Union, the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy and the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism of Peru, the Workers' World Party of the United States of America and the UNICEF and diplomatic envoys of Grenada, Peru and Cameroon at UN.
					
					They presented floral baskets and bouquets before the portrait of Kim Jong Il and paid silent tribute.
					
					The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Peruvian Communist Party said the demise of Kim Jong Il was a great loss to not only the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people but the revolutionary parties and progressives of the whole world.
					
					The senior adviser for the UN and Intergovernmental Affairs of the UNICEF expressed profound condolences on the demise of Kim Jong Il on behalf of the organization and on his own as Chinese.

articles.title: Foreigners Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Personages of Brazil, Mexico, Mozambique, Democratic Congo, Nigeria and Zimbabwe expressed deep condolences on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il on December 27 and 28 last year. 
					They paid condolatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries. 
					
					They include members of the Leadership of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, the director general of the Fund of Laurent Desire Kabila, former president of Democratic Congo, the director for Americas, Asia and Oceania of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Democratic Congo and the chairman of the Nigerian Investment Promoting Committee.
					
					They laid wreaths, floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the portraits of Kim Jong Il and paid silent tribute to him.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held in Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- A memorial service for Kim Jong Il took place in Kinshasa on Dec. 28 last year under the sponsorship of the Democratic Congo Committee for Memory of the Great Leader Kim Jong Il.
					Present there were personages of the political parties and organizations including the Communist Party, the People's Rally for the Socialism and the Working Citizens' Association and members of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea and the friendship and solidarity organizations.
					
					Participants laid wreaths before the portrait of Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to him. 
					
					Then they watched the video of the solemn ceremony of bidding last farewell to Kim Jong Il held in Pyongyang.
					
					Speakers praised the undying feats of Kim Jong Il who ushered in the turning phase of building a thriving nation and reunifying the country by the Juche idea and the Songun politics and made great contributions to defending socialism and global independence.
					
					Adopted there was a joint statement.
					
					The statement noted that they are sure that though Kim Jong Il passed away, the Korean people would turn the grief of today into strength and courage under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, great successor, and firmly defend socialism, the valuable heritage bequeathed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and further strengthen it.
					
					It stressed that Kim Jong Il would always live in their minds, adding that his idea and cause would be immortal and the DPRK would continue to be prosperous as Kim Jong Un stands in the van of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Pledges Renewed to Faithfully Uphold Ideas and Leadership of Supreme Commander
articles.content:
Pledges Renewed to Faithfully Uphold Ideas and Leadership of Supreme Commander
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- I will hold Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the only centre of unity and cohesion of the Party and leadership as befitting a member of the first generation of the revolution which made long journeys of bloody battles against the Japanese imperialists under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung. Anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter Kim Chol Man said this upon receiving the news that Kim Jong Un assumed the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					Senior officials of the Party, army and state are greatly pleased and excited to have the pride of holding another illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu-type born of Heaven.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, noted that Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership is an expression of the firm will of the WPK and the people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun started in Mt. Paektu under his leadership.
					
					Choe evinced his resolution to fully embody the idea of attaching importance to arms and military affairs, true to the Songun politics of the Party.
					
					Kim Jong Gak, first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, noted that it is the greatest honor of the KPA to be blessed with great supreme commanders generation after generation.
					
					He stressed that the whole army would become 7th Regiment today which devotedly protects the supreme commander as a ten thousand-fold bulwark, in hearty response to the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un!"
					
					Vice-Premier Ro Tu Chol said that all the leading officials in the field of the economy pledge themselves to bolster the nation's defense capability and bring about a decisive turn in building an economic power and improving the standard of people's living true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the supreme commander.

articles.title: South Hamgyong Provincial Mass Rally Held
articles.content:
South Hamgyong Provincial Mass Rally Held
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- A South Hamgyong Provincial mass rally took place at Hamhung Square Monday to thoroughly carry out the decision of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the militant tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial. 
					Kwak Pom Gi, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, made a report to be followed by speeches at the rally. 
					
					The reporter and speakers said that all servicepersons and people held a mass rally at the emotional period when they turned out in the general advance in the first year when the history of new hundred year of Kim Il Sung's Korea begins with the boundless glory and pride of holding in high esteem the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the great successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche, as the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army,.
					
					They said that the above-said decision, joint calls and the tasks set out in the joint New Year editorial on the New Year 2012 serve as a militant banner to be held aloft by the whole Party, army and all people.
					
					They proposed sending a letter earnestly calling upon the working people across the country who bid farewell to the year of greatest grief and greeted 2012, reflecting the will of all the participants in the rally, to keep the firm pledge made before the bier of Kim Jong Il.
					
					A letter to all the working people across the country was read out at the rally. 
					
					It said that the above-said decision and joint calls and the tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial on the New Year 2012, historic year, represent the pledge made by all the people before the bier of Kim Jong Il in bitter tears. 
					
					Noting that working people of South Hamgyong Province made a firm promise before all the people of the country to devotedly fulfill the solemn pledge made before the bier of Kim Jong Il, the letter went on:
					
					All the working people, let us turn out as one as befitting descendants of Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il to open up without fail the great door of prosperity true to the plan of Kim Jong Il in his lifetime in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung! 
					
					Now is the time to clearly show the world that the conviction of Korea that when Kim Jong Il is determined, the people will do without fail is unshakable no matter how conditions and circumstances may change. 
					
					The great door to prosperity is sure to be opened when all the fields and units of the country bear in mind the behests of Kim Jong Il one by one and thoroughly implement them with the indomitable mental power and traits of persevering struggle. 
					
					The pace-setters who have dashed ahead in the van of the march for a great surge should display a hundred-fold strength. If there be people lagging behind should get awakened and throw themselves into the general offensive for 2012 with courage, though belatedly. 
					
					All the working people across the country!
					
					The great march of Korea to accomplish the sacred revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Kim Jong Un is the supreme leader of the Party, army and people of the DPRK as he has inherited the idea, leadership ability, personality, virtues, courage and grits of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					As we have the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the top of the Korean revolution, the victory in the drive for a great surge is certain and we will surely build a thriving socialist nation, the lifelong wishes of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, on this land.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Central Standing Committee of Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Central Standing Committee of Chongryon
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Saturday.
					Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army is the greatest honor and fortune, the message said, and went on:
					
					Kim Jong Un, who is possessed of the spirit of Mt. Paektu, is another General of Mt. Paektu-type identical to leader Kim Jong Il in the idea, leadership, personality, virtue, courage and pluck.
					
					Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan deeply grieved over the sudden, untimely and regretful demise of Kim Jong Il. But they could rise up like a phoenix to thoroughly implement his behests because you are at the helm of the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					We will conduct the vigorous patriotic movement holding the same slogan as held by the people in the motherland and keeping pace with their dynamic drive on the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					We will hold you in high esteem as the center of the unity and the leadership and strengthen Chongryon into an overseas compatriots organization of the Republic, which would remain loyal to his leadership.
					
					We will dynamically conduct external activities with your high prestige and make a tangible contribution to achieving the country's reunification and building socialist motherland and thus fully discharge our patriotic duties.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Will Have to Pay Dearly for Their Unethical Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Will Have to Pay Dearly for Their Unethical Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The shuddering acts committed by the south Korean conservative group when the nation suffered a great loss are the thrice-cursed crimes against ethics and the nation as they were little short of rubbing salt into the wounds of the grief-stricken compatriots and the worst evil acts to escalate the confrontation and tension between the north and the south and bring down the dignified system of the DPRK.
					Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a by-lined commentary.
					
					It goes on:
					
					It is nobody's secret that Lee Myung Bak group has so far hatched a criminal plot to eliminate the ideology and system of the DPRK, talking about what it called "contingency". Its foolish scenario was more clearly proved by what it did during the nation's mourning over the great loss. The conservative group kicked up such fuss as issuing an "emergency alert order" and proclaiming "emergency posture" after misjudging the situation so seriously that it claimed the "contingency" was about to take place immediately as expected. It, at the same time, worked hard to destabilize the DPRK through an anti-DPRK psychological warfare.
					
					The DPRK has upheld their leader with loyalty but the puppet group worked hard to hurt the faith and will of its people and gravely infringed upon their dignity, vociferating about "separate counter-action." For these crimes alone the group deserves to be hacked to pieces.
					
					In a nutshell, what the group perpetrated this time is the thrice-cursed crimes putting into the shade the crimes committed by traitor Kim Young Sam, "civilian"-veiled dictator in 1994. 
					
					We know too well that the above-said reckless acts were planned and perpetrated by traitor Lee. He is the root cause of the collapse of the inter-Korean relations and all calamities.
					
					As we declared before, we will never pardon the unethical crimes and treachery of the Lee group but finally settle accounts with it unless it apologizes for its crimes, their knees bent before us.
					
					The nation will never gloss over the recent big treason committed by the south Korean conservative group but keep strict tabs on it.

articles.title: Russian Internet Newspaper Carries Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Russian Internet Newspaper Carries Kim Jong Il′s Work
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- A Russian internet newspaper carried the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" on Dec. 28 last year on the demise of Kim Jong Il.
					The work published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995) calls for holding fast and giving top priority to the ideological work to successfully carry out socialist cause. The work also expounds that the main task of the ideological work is to model the whole society on the socialist idea and the ideological work should be conducted on the principle and ways suited to the intrinsic demand of socialism.
					
					The newspaper carried a portrait of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Hu Jintao Calls for Improving Party Work
articles.content:
Hu Jintao Calls for Improving Party Work
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Hu Jintao, general secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of China, at the meeting of its Political Bureau on Dec. 30 last year stressed the need to step up the campaign for establishing the party discipline, enforcing clean-handed policy and combating corruption.
					The general demand of the campaign for the year 2012 is to comprehensively implement the spirit of the 17th Congress of the Party and the 3rd, 4th, 5th and 6th plenary meetings of the 17th-term Central Committee of the Party and adhere to the policy of giving importance to the work to combat the corruption in advance by means of punishment and prevention, he said.
					
					He also underlined the need to establish the strict party discipline, intensify the improvement of the party's work style and concentrate efforts on solving the issues fully representing the wish of the popular masses in enforcing anti-corrupt clean handed policy.

articles.title: Iran Not to Yield to U.S. Expansionism: President
articles.content:
Iran Not to Yield to U.S. Expansionism: President
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad said on Wednesday that the Iranian nation will never yield to the U.S. expansionist policies.
					The president made the remark while addressing a big gathering of provincial people in the western city of Ilam.
					
					He said the U.S. and its allies have been working against Iran for 32 years now.
					
					He said enemies keep labeling the Iranian nation with baseless accusations while they are the only ones to deserve such behavior.

articles.title: IRGC Deputy Commander Dismisses U.S. Warnings over Strait of Hormuz
articles.content:
IRGC Deputy Commander Dismisses U.S. Warnings over Strait of Hormuz
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The deputy commander of Iran's Islamic Revolution Guards Corps dismissed the U.S. warnings over Iran at the interview with the local satellite Press TV on Dec. 29, last year.
					Dismissing the U.S. recent warnings over Iranian threats to close Strait of Hormuz, he said that the Islamic Republic of Iran asks for no other country's permission for the implementation of its defense strategies.
					
					Noting that the United States is in no position to give permission to Iran and the history of confrontations between Tehran and Washington has attested to this fact, he stressed that the Islamic Republic has managed to proceed with its strategies in face of U.S. pressures.

articles.title: Cooperation among Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Countries
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- China and Cuba agreed on Dec. 27 last year to work on the development of a bilateral economic agenda in the medium term.
					Iran and Indonesia inked an agreement on mutual cooperation in social welfare on the same day.

articles.title: Natural Disasters in Different Countries
articles.content:
Natural Disasters in Different Countries
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Casualties by floods are increasing in number in Thailand.
					The flooding left 790 persons dead and three missing as of December 29 last year.
					
					The number of victims reached 2.3 million in the central region of the country.
					
					Meanwhile, floods by heavy rain recently stroke Australia's northern territories, creating confusion. Dwelling houses were under water, many residents were left homeless and roads were blocked while a freight train was derailed.
					
					At least three villagers have died and 2 561 have been displaced by volcanic mudflow in eastern Indonesia. A government spokesman said heavy rains caused cold lava and debris to flow into villages near Mount Gamalama in Ternate, Maluku province on Tuesday.

articles.title: Statistics of Jobless in Japan
articles.content:
Statistics of Jobless in Japan
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The number of the unemployment reached to 2.8 million in Japan in November last year, according to the statistics published by the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the country on Dec. 28 last year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde tributo a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde tributo a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo, Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito, rindio sublime homenaje el dia primero al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan. 
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion los cuadros directivos de los organismos del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas: Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk y Kim Chang Sop, los miembros de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, y los integrantes del mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC. 
					
					Kim Jong Un se dirigio primero al hall donde se halla la estatua de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Ante la estatua, fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el CDN, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC. 
					
					Rindio el mas sublime homenaje ante la estatua de pie y el cuerpo del Presidente junto con los acompanantes.
					
					Paso seguidamente al hall donde fue instalado el retrato del Dirigente Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa.
					
					Fue depositado ante el retrato un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el CDN, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC. 
					
					Kim Jong Un rindio el mas sentido tributo a la memoria del Dirigente junto con los acompanantes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Division de Tanques 105 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Division de Tanques 105 del EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo, Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito, visito el dia primero la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del EPC con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup, y felicito a los oficiales y soldados. 
					Los oficiales y soldados de la division rindieron con infinita veneracion el saludo del Ano Nuevo al Comandante Supremo quien la visito con el ardiente amor del padre Dirigente pensando en los soldados que acogen el Nuevo Ano con el sentimiento doloroso de haber perdido al Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Tras recibir el parte de recepcion, el Comandante Supremo apreto las manos de los oficiales diciendo que tenia ganas de encontrarse con ellos que pasarian con lagrimas los dias tristes por el fallecimiento del Dirigente y les encomendo  recobrar el animo. 
					
					Guiado por los oficiales de la division, el Comandantes Supremo recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la sala de presentacion del historial. 
					
					La division de tanques 105 es una de las unidades donde estan impregnadas muchas huellas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, dijo y apunto que los oficiales y soldados de la division deben guardar en lo profundo del corazon abnegacion de los grandes hombres dedicada por el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas de tanques del pais y consolidar mas  la division como un destacamento de los combatientes sin rivales. 
					
					Acto seguido, el Comandante Supremo estuvo en la sala de estudio de operaciones y la biblioteca electronica y vio los aparatos de entrenamiento, enterandose de los ejercicios y de la disposicion combativa. 
					
					Aprecio mucho que los oficiales y soldados de la division intensifican los ejercicios y los preparativos de combate observando con alta vigilancia las maniobras agresivas de los enemigos  sin relajar ni un momento la tension.
					
					Subrayo la necesidad de establecer el estilo revolucionario de ejercicios, el fervor de ejercicios del monte Paektu con la conciencia de que solo los bien entrenados en tiempo de paz podrian cumplir en el tiempo de guerra la mision sagrada asumida ante la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Hay que mantener siempre el estado de alerta a punto de disparar haciendo preparativos de combate con el espiritu revolucionario de apoyarse en sus propias fuerzas y superar las dificultades por su propia cuenta, y teniendo siempre el estado de movilizacion normal de armas y materiales y equipos tecnicos de combate, enseno. 
					
					Pregunto minuciosamente sobre la utilizacion de computadoras en la biblioteca electronica y dijo que alegre estaria el Dirigente si lo viera. 
					
					Ese dia el Comandante Supremo recorrio una subunidad de Bandera Roja de Tres Revoluciones, adscrita a la division, averiguando con afecto paternal la vida de los soldados. 
					
					Se regocijo que los soldados pasan calientes en el cuartel durante todo el invierno utilizando las instalaciones de calefaccion enviadas por el Dirigente.
					
					Midio personalmente la temperatura del cuartel y dijo que en adelante visitaria sin aviso para medir la temperatura. 
					
					Al ver diversas comidas en la mesa de cocina, encomendo reiteradamente que agasajaran bien a los soldados y agrego que deben ofrecer una abundante vida alimentaria a los soldados a quienes amaban tanto el Dirigente. 
					
					Atender bien la vida de los militares es el deber de los miembros de mando, dijo y agrego que los oficiales deben ser hermanos mayores y companeros revolucionarios de armas de los soldados compartido las alegrias y las penas con ellos. 
					
					El Comandante Supremo tomo una fotografia de recuerdo con los oficiales y soldados de la division. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC, Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, el general de ejercito del EPC, Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Hwang Pyong So, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y los generales de ejercito del EPC, Pak Jae Gyong y Hyon Chol Hae.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de Ano Nuevo de la Orquesta Unhasu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de Ano Nuevo de la Orquesta Unhasu
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito, presencio el concierto del Ano Nuevo 2012 de la Orquesta Unhasu "Sera eterna la causa del Sol".
					El Comandante Supremo respondio cordialmente a las aclamaciones de los espectadores dandoles calidas felicitaciones por el Ano Nuevo.
					
					Luego de interpretado el Himno Nacional, los espectadores guardaron un momento de silencio rindiendo los mas sentidos tributos a la memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En la escena se presentaron el trio femenino y coro "Al camarada Kim Jong Il", el trio y pangchang (coro del foso) femeninos de la obra clasica "Cancion de la bendicion", el coro "La vida del Dirigente", el duo y pangchang masculinos "Anorando al General", el solo masculino y pangchang "Cuando cantamos sobre el Songun", la musica orquestal y coro "En el camino de lucha siguiendo al General", la narracion y musica orquestal "Corea se levanto" y otras piezas de diferentes generos.
					
					En la ocasion, los ejecutantes corroboraron con sus canciones y poesias que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue el corazon del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, el destino y el porvenir de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y el simbolo de dignidad, poderio e invencibles fuerzas de la Corea del Songun, y todo el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos vinieron recorriendo la gloriosa senda de la revolucion bajo la guia del Dirigente mas grande, extraordinario, entusiasta, firme, noble y verdadero de la epoca actual.
					
					El concierto dejo profundamente impresionados a los espectadores demostrando firmemente que el Dirigente estara siempre al frente de la marcha general de los coreanos, que avanzan con gran fe hacia la nueva victoria de la revolucion jucheana bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, y en el corazon del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos.
					
					Terminado el concierto, Kim Jong Un respondio a las efusivas aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los ejecutantes hayan ofrecido este magnifico concierto con claros temas ideologicos reflejando la aspiracion, el deseo, el juramento y la disposicion del pueblo coreano, evaluo altamente la exitosa funcion y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					Apreciando la programacion del concierto, en particular, la recitacion de la poesia narrativa, senalo que no pudo contener las lagrimas cuando se proyectaba la imagen generosa del Dirigente       Kim Jong Il, y le ha animado mucho el concierto.
					
					Destaco que es muy alto el indoblegable espiritu del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que acogieron el Ano Nuevo con el juramento de enaltecer eternamente al Dirigente y materializar hasta el final su legado.
					
					Expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo produciran otra vez grandes innovaciones y saltos en la marcha del Ano Nuevo para hacer de 2012 el ano de juramento y materializacion en que demuestren a todo el mundo como los soldados y discipulos del Dirigente materializan sus deseos.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion los cuadros directivos de los organos del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas: Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, O Kuk Ryol, Kang Sok Ju, Pyon Yong Rip, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Rak Hui, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk y Kim Chang Sop, y los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y el Poder, organizaciones sociales, ministerios, organos centrales, organismos de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitaciones que le enviara el 30 de diciembre del ano pasado el presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					El mensaje sigue:
					
					Con motivo de que Su Excelencia devino el Maximo Dirigente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, le extiendo las mas sinceras felicitaciones en nombre del pueblo arabe sirio y el mio propio deseando exitos en su nuevo cargo.
					
					Estoy convencido de que las estrechas relaciones de amistad entre la RAS y la RPDC se fortaleceran conforme a los intereses de ambos pueblos amistosos bajo la direccion de Su Excelencia.
					
					Reciba mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Personalidades extranjeras expresan pesame por deceso de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Personalidades extranjeras expresan pesame por deceso de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, las personalidades del Partido Comunista Peruano, el Movimiento Revolucionario Velaquista del Peru, la Union Popular de Mujeres Peruanas, el Instituto de Amistad Peru-Corea para el Estudio de la Politica de Songun del Juche, el Grupo de Estudio de Kimilsunismo del Peru, el Partido Mundial de los Obreros de EE.UU. y el Fondo de las Naciones Unidas para la Infancia (UNICEF), los representantes de Granada, El Peru y Camerun ante la ONU, hicieron los dias 27 y 28 de diciembre del ano pasado una visita de condolencias a la representacion de Corea en el Peru y la otra permanente ante la ONU.
					Tras depositar cesto y ramos de flores ante el retrato del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, ellos guardaron un momento de silencio.
					
					El secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista Peruano, dijo que el fallecimiento del Dirigente constituye una gran perdida tanto para el Partido del Trabajo y el pueblo, de Corea como para los partidos revolucionarios y el pueblo progresista de este orbe.
					
					En representacion de la UNICEF, un funcionario de esta organizacion internacional subrayo que siendo un chino, expreso las mas sentidas condolencias por el  fallecimiento de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun vuelve a denunciar actos inmorales de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun vuelve a denunciar actos inmorales de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- En el periodo de gran duelo nacional, la banda de conservadores surcoreanos cometio la fechoria imperdonable, inmoral y antinacional de acuchillar a los ya adoloridos connacionales. Esta maldad esta encaminada a exacerbar la confrontacion y tension entre ambas partes coreanas y perjudicar el muy digno regimen de la RPDC.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					No es secreto que la banda de Lee Myung Bak vino ideando el complot criminal para acabar con la ideologia y el regimen de la RPDC aprovechando la supuesta "situacion de emergencia". 
					
					El absurdo intento de los titeres surcoreanos quedo revelado claramente en el plazo de duelo nacional.
					
					Ellos ordenaron la "guardia de emergencia" y la "espera de emergencia" juzgando erroneamente la situacion como si fuera inminente el "estado de emergencia", que deseaban tanto, y trataron freneticamente de desestabilizar el interior de la RPDC mediante la campana psicologica.
					
					Ellos merecen ser descuartizados por el solo hecho de que intentaron desvirtuar la conviccion y la moralidad del pueblo de la RPDC, fiel a su lider, e insultaron gravemente la dignidad de esta hablando de las llamadas "reacciones diferenciadas".
					
					Las fechorias de la banda de Lee son peores que las cometidas hace 14 anos por el tirano "civil" Kim Young Sam.
					
					Es bien conocido que todas esas maldades inmorales fueron ideadas y cometidas por el mismo traidor Lee Myung Bak quien es la causa de la catastrofe de relaciones intercoreanas y de todas las calamidades.
					
					Como hemos declarado ya, no perdonaremos jamas los crimenes inmorales y antinacionales de la banda de Lee Myung Bak y no tendremos otra alternativa que ajustar la cuenta final si ellos no piden disculpas.
					
					Sus crimenes nunca seran pasados por alto.
